title: It's hilarious how people still ban Fiora in bronze...
body: No-one can even play her properly in bronze.

replies.body: No one can play anyone in bronze...
Your argument is invalid,  I play Lux fine in bronze.
I played Fiora, she isn't hard but pretty hard late game if your new to her, But I can see your point of view as she isn't a played champ under 30 in a Normal match
Dude just because people are in bronze doesnt mean they cant or dont have the skill to play a certin champion

I'm bronze, and I can understand her kit perfectly fine. I think I also have a very positive k/d/a and kill contribution on her.

Also she's not hard to steamroll a lane with. Get an early kill, grab a pickaxe and TP back to lane to shit on your opponent some more.

No one can play any one properly in Bronze

Except Yi and Xin Zhao. But no one in bronze plays Xin Zhao.
implying she has to be played properly to faceroll.
